pkgmetadata.longdescription: The LCDF Typetools package contains several programs for manipulating PostScript Type 1, Type 1 multiple master, and PostScript-flavored OpenType fonts. LCDF Typetools includes the mmafm and mmpfb programs, which were formerly distributed as part of a different package (mminstance).
